page.title: 05SHOPPING
page.content:
The only shop in Ireby is a Post Office with a small general store which according to our questionnaire is used by everybody.
When asked where they do their main shopping 33 people mentioned Wigton, 13 mentioned Carlisle, 5 said Cockermouth, 4 said Keswick, 2 said Workington and 2 said Ireby, the large majority travelling there by car. Only 5 people use the bus for shopping.
A number of travelling shops visit Ireby and when asked which they used people replied as follows:- Greengrocer _ 7 people. Grocer _ 24 people. Baker _ 7 people. Fishmonger _ 9 people. Butcher _ 8 people. 11 said they never use any of these .
